transcript:
if things are hard for you right now
I've got a really important message
grapes must be crushed in order to make
wine diamonds only form under pressure
olives must be pressed in order to
create olive oil and seeds only grow in
the darkness so whenever you feel
crushed or whenever you feel pressure or
whenever you feel like you're in the
darkness you are in a powerful place of
transformation you just have to trust
the process
